name: Penguin Savior
description:
This game was created for the LudumDare 31

Help you fellow penguins live in peace and harmony without ever having to fear the fabled seals! Go through and destroy the seals. Don't forget to eat your snacks on the way. After you have destroyed the seals you seem to find an odd looking brown iceberg that is warm and cozy, what adventures lie ahead?

Controls - A/D to move, W/Space to jump

There are only 5 levels, please don't forget to rate and leave comment!

The game is totally free but you can still decide to donate to help me fund coffee for the next LudumDare.
